meanings.definition: A style of South African music characterized by traditional rhythms and modern influences.
meanings.sent1: The mbaqanga filled the air with lively beats.
meanings.sent2: People danced joyfully to the mbaqanga music.
meanings.sent3: I can't help but tap my feet to the catchy mbaqanga tunes.
meanings.sent4: Her heart sang to the rhythm of the mbaqanga melodies.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant mbaqanga rhythms stayed with me long after the music ended.

meanings.definition: A traditional South African dish made of maize meal and vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's mbaqanga was always a comforting meal.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the mbaqanga filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled mbaqanga on my shirt, but it smelled delicious.
meanings.sent4: The warm mbaqanga reminded me of home.
meanings.sent5: The flavorful mbaqanga brought back memories of family gatherings.

meanings.definition: To play or listen to mbaqanga music.
meanings.sent1: Let's mbaqanga together at the party tonight!
meanings.sent2: She loves to mbaqanga with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to mbaqanga all night long.
meanings.sent4: They decided to mbaqanga until the sun came up.
meanings.sent5: Mbaqangaing under the stars felt magical.
